title: Full Stack Developer Internship
description:
About the job
Refonte (Refonte AI) is an industry-leading IT firm, globally recognized for innovation in AI, web development, app development, data science, data analytics, UI/UX design, and digital marketing. We’re committed to driving excellence in technology and empowering talent worldwide.

For more information :
visit our website https://refontelearning.com/
company_about:
Unlock your potential in the digital realm with Refonte Learning! We are an Ed-Tech powerhouse under Refonte Private Limited, offering comprehensive IT training programs. Develop vital competencies like Python, SQL, Tableau, and Advanced Excel through our engaging, hands-on approach. Invest in yourself and thrive in the digital age.The unique Global Training & Internship Program combines industry-relevant training with real-world project work alongside experienced professionals. Gain hands-on experience and international exposure, preparing you for a successful career in IT and digital marketing. Refonte Learning also provides top-notch digital marketing services, helping businesses grow their reach through tailored solutions exceeding expectations.At Refonte Learning, you'll gain the knowledge and practical skills you need to succeed in the digital world, all under the guidance of experienced professionals and industry leaders. Our flexible learning options and focus on real-world application through projects and internships ensure you can tailor your education to your specific goals and career aspirations, while simultaneously gaining valuable international exposure through our OGTIP program.Ready to take your career to the next level?Visit our website or contact us today to discover how Refonte Learning can empower your career journey and equip you with the skills and experience you need to achieve your goals.

title: Data Entry Clerk Remote (Entry Level)
description:
About the job
Position: Remote Data Entry Clerk 

We are seeking dedicated individuals to join our team as Full Time/Part-Time Remote Data Entry Clerks. The primary responsibility of this role is to accurately input and maintain data in our systems. The ideal candidate will possess strong typing skills, impeccable attention to detail, and the ability to work with minimal supervision. You will have the opportunity to participate in national and local focus groups, clinical trials, and market research studies, which may be conducted remotely or on-site.





















This role is perfect for anyone looking for temporary, part-time, or full-time work with flexible hours, including those currently working as data entry clerks or anyone interested in a part-time, remote, work-from-home position. This is a great way to earn extra income without any prior experience required.
company_about: Providing cutting-edge solutions and strategies that drive your success.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
About the job
Job Title: Frontend Developer 
Job Type: Full-time
Location: Remote

About Us:
At micro1, we’re all about connecting skilled remote professionals with some of the best companies in Silicon Valley. Our mission is to offer a stable, competitive income, along with access to top industry opportunities—all in a flexible work setting with a range of great benefits. We’re here to help you grow in your career. We're proud to work with trusted partners such as Deel, Immutable, O’Gara, and LegalSoft.
company_about:
AI recruitment engine to hire the best talent on earth. Hire from our pre-vetted talent pool instantly or use our software to vet your own talent 10x faster. We’re building the AI engine that will match 1 billion people with their dream role.
